title: 820-00138 No Backlight!
message: I'm working on a A1398 that displays properly on the LCD however there is no backlight. I have measured ~54v coming in to Pin 1 of the LVDS connector. Is it possible for the backlight in the display assembly to blow?

title: 820-00138 No Backlight!
message: Try another display cable... 54V means there is no load on backlight circuit...

title: 820-00138 No Backlight!
message: Either bad cable or connector. Or could be inside LCD but that is the last option.
